items.title: A problem solver leverages businesses with Software Engineering

bullet: Started his career as an embedded engineer in a startup and a global automotive company in Vietnam since 2014
Has been working for few startups and local clients in Winnipeg, majored in Web Development, DevOps, Data Science and Machine Learning
Has been been involved in leader and management roles in the past year
Is looking for a challenging part-time position

items.title: A problem solver leverages businesses with tech

bullet: Started his career as an embedded engineer in a startup and a global automotive company in Vietnam since 2014
Has been working for few startups and local clients in Winnipeg, majored in Web Development, DevOps, Data Science and Machine Learning
Has been been involved in leader and management roles in the past year
Is looking for more responsibility in larger organization
The first company in Vietnam that invested R&D for UAV for military and filming industry leading the market in Vietnam and Germany at the time
Joined the team as a second year student, Improved power efficiency and stability of the prototypes
Researched and developed embedded solutions in unmanned aerial vehicle (UAV) system
Designed hardware schematics/layouts and embedded software for UAV modules: GPS, PMM, ESC
Performed system integration and testing on flying prototypes
Worked for few local clients including small embedded firms, academic projects, military projects
Helped students to focus on their things by helping them prepare embedded prototypes
Designed PCB and provided embedded software solution to local clients and funded projects
Mainly focused on IoT applications, M2M, Wifi and Bluetooth
Was part of the team in Vietnam office, customized and maintained Body Control Module (BCM) platform for Geely and Volkswagen
Was offered a promotion and invited by Chinese engineers to be a team leader of the RF team
Performed software design, maintenance, bugs fixing in 4 projects at the same time
Ensured automotive industry standards by unit testing, integration testing, software quality auditing, maintaining implementation document
Assisted Germany engineer debugging prototypes
Completed Geely project from the first phase to the Start-Of-Production (SOP)
Customized Body Control Module (BCM) for 3 customers using both model base (Matlab) and manual code (C/C++)
Researched NFC technology and standards, developed testing strategy, implemented peripheral drivers
Was funded by Health Sciences Centre to build a VR system connecting with sensor on a wheelchair, which help people learn how to use wheelchair better
Joined the project as a volunteer, stated being paid after 2 weeks of performance demonstration
Proposed an embedded solution to process IMU data with power efficiency improvement
Developed project objectives, work plans and implement strategy on the system architect
Assisted the research team with the most difficult issues such as communications and protocols
Researched and developed a Bluetooth plug-in for a VR applications with Unity, Android Studio and Visual Studio
Designed schematics and layout using Eagle, developed embedded driver and Kalman filter for IMU processing
Joined one of the teams at LaivLy for the COOP term at Red River College
Focusing on maintaining Robotic Process Automation (RPA), collecting data from multiple databases to build analytic reports
Used multiple programming languages such as C#, HTML, CSS, JavaScript, XAML on .NET platform with Entity Framework and MS SQL Database
Worked on a research project as Machine Learning Researcher, built and trained various Deep Learning models to solve Stranger Identification problem on an embedded linux device
Successfully demonstrated working ML/DL concepts with a real-time application which was a key factor of winning a funding round
Kicked off the project Virtual Health Assistant
Trained and assisted the team as a Team Lead to build a Content Management System (CMS)
Integrated Question Answering system into the CMS system
Built and trained various deep Convolutional Neural networks (CNN) focusing on similarity models on a High-Performance Computer
Integrate the trained model onto the target embedded device
Set up and deployed an auto-training process, which automatically generate various of CNNs and monitor the training process continuously in real-time
Integrated ML modules include with the complexity of various hardware components (CPU/GPU/TPU)
Led the team on the funded project, trained team members, analyze requirements and assigned tasks to team members
Designed the CMS system with Django and Postgres Database, Integrated on-device AI nodes using machine-to-machine (M2M) protocol
Experimented different Natural Language Processing (NLP) approaches to build Question Answering system
Was part of the core development team that helps the company reaching the market-leading position
Designed the automated process of collecting 3D building data and reconstructing it into the useful form
Estimated BIPV solar irradiant and production power based on the effect of the sunlight and weather condition
Implemented a C++ engine processed architect data and reconstruct sketchup files
Implemented a Unity engine that simulates weather condition and and the effect of sunlight on BIPV materials
Cleaned and studied data (Jupyter Notebook), reconstructed data with the analysis result
Dockerize and built the automated report pipeline (NodeJs, Gatsby, React)
Wrote about the technologies I learned on my way
Shared my thought about career development and life
Maintained the web app integrated with NFC technology to reduce the use of paper and enhance marketing effectiveness for businesses
Kicked off the project, defined the technology and project scope
Led functional teams including design, development, management
Reviewed code, supported development team removing the obstacles on their way
Trained new members, researched and applied new technology to new projects
Designed the system and software architect (Django web app), maintained structural database (Postgres)
Configured Google Cloud Platform for scalability, Developed CI/CD pipeline
Maintained the Onsight augmented reality service platform empowers workers to rapidly diagnose, inspect, and manage assets in even the most difficult field environments
Implemented and integrated screen sharing feature into the streaming pipeline
Analyzed specs, implemented and integrated SCIM into Azure Active Directory
Assisted COOP students on building model for a Computer Vision project, maintained NLP feature (text-to-speech, and speech-to-text)
Fixed bugs on Xamarin application (Android, IOS, Windows, VR headsets) and ASP.NET backend, using different tech stacks (C#, C++, Java, Objective C, Swift)
Integrated new features, resolved complexity of conflicts with the existing infrastructure
Controls/Sensors: ultrasonic, EPPROM, DMA, gyroscope, accelerate-meter, magneto-meter, RF receivers, NFC, capacity touch sensor
Hardware: 2-layer PCB layout and schematic designs
Software: C/C++ and assembly, m-script, model based generation
Protocol: UART, SPI, I2C, GPIO, SDIO, CAN, LIN, Ethernet
Tools: MATLAB, Keil, IAR, Eagle, Altium, oscilloscopes and logic analyzer
Software Components: UDS Diagnostics, Active/passive Entry, UDS Diagnostics, RF receiver stack, NFC stack
Basic Software: Diag Stack (DEH, IsoTP); System Stack (SysStateM, BleM, ucDrv, Gpt); Memory Stack (NvM); Io Stack (AdcDrv, DioDrv, SpiDrv, TauDrv)
Tools: CANoe, IAR, CppUTest, Tessy, Rhapsody, IBM DOORS
Geometry Processing, Computer Animation, Vector Graphics, 3D physical modeling, Shader
Rotation and Transformation (Quaternion and Rotation Matrix)
VR, AR, WebGL
Frameworks: Unity, OpenGL, WebGL, SketchupAPI
Xamarin (Android - IOS - Window): C#, C++, Java, Objective C, Swift, Android studio, XCode
Flutter (Android - IOS - Web): Dart
Unity (Android - IOS - Window - Ubuntu): C#
Cloud: GCP, AWS, DigitalOcean
Database: Firebase, Google Cloud SQL, MongoDB Atlas, Amazon RDS
Platform: Ubuntu, CentOs, Server Core, Window Server, Android
Container: docker, docker compose, Google Cloud Run,  Google Cloud Registry (GCR), Amazon Elastic Container Service (ECS), Amazon Elastic Container Registry (ECR)
Virtual Machine: Google App Engine (GAE), Google Compute Engine (GCE), Amazon Elastic Compute Cloud (EC2), Amazon Lightsail
Continuous Integration and Deployment: dockerize apps and tests, Github Action, environment configuration
Networking: Nginx, Apache
Monitor: Sentry, Splunk, container log
Environment: node, pip, Anaconda
RESTful APIs, MQTT, M2M
C/C++, Java,  C#, Javascript, Typescript, Python, Dart
JSON Web Token (JWT), middleware
Backend architect, design pattern
HTML, CSS, SCSS, SASS, JavaScript, Dart, Bootstrap
jQuery, Ajax
Angular, React, Flutter, Gatsby, WebFlow
Bootstrap, jQuery - Entity .NET - MsSQL
React - Express Node - Mongodb
Flutter - Aqueduct/Express Node  - Mongodb
Material, Angular - Express Node - Mongodb/Postgres
WebFlow, jQuery - Django - Postgres
Bootstrap - Flask - MsSQL
NoSQL Database: MongoDB, Neo4j
SQL Database: Oracle Sql, MsSql, SQLite, MySQl, Postgres
SQL Tasks: Trigger, Procedure, Report, SQL Server Profiler, Export-Transform-Load ETL, Relational Normalization, Query Optimization, Data Migration
Deep Neural Network: Convolutional Neural Network (CNN), Recurrent Neural Network (RNN)
Computer vision: Object detection/classification, Image segmentation, Facial recognition/verification (Siamese Network, One Shot Learning, Triplet loss)
Classifiers (SVM, KNN, Softmax, ...), Optimizers (GRD, Adam, ...), Hyperparameter
Data Cleaning, training from scratch, transfer learning, automate training process, monitor training
Tools: Jupyter Notebooks, Numpy, Tensorflow, Keras, Pytorch, Tensorboard, OpenCV
Geometry data: GeoJSON, PostGIS, GeoRSS
Architectural data: Sketchup
Signal Processing: Analog/Digital Signal Processing, Low-level optimization with C/C++ and assembly
Optimizations: Kalman filter (KF, EKF), data encryption, signal modulation (RF), proportional–integral–derivative control (PID)
Tools: Jupyter Notebooks, Numpy, Panda, Matlab modelling

description.text: Electrical - Electrical Engineering, Electronics - Telecommunication, Embedded System Software and Hardware

items.title: Applied Computer Education Innovation Award
items.organization: Applied Computer Education Department, Red River College

description.text: The purpose of this award is to recognize innovative achievement, including the process of discovery, and creation or conception of the innovation.

items.title: Paterson GlobalFoods Business Infomation Technology Award

description.text: Demonstrated career aspirations and volunteer activity in the community and displayed a strong work ethic in class with a minimum GPA of 3.00.

items.title: Applied Computer Education Department Award
items.organization: Applied Computer Education Department, Red River College

description.text: Criteria include a letter of recommendation from an instructor, a portfolio of work, a grade report, as well as an essay that describes the experience in the program, career aspirations, and include examples of class leadership.
Criteria include financial need, a strong academic record (minimum cumulative GPA of 3.00), as well as an essay or letter outlining volunteerism/community involvement.

items.title: School of Business and Applied Arts Award

description.text: Red River College award endowment fund, established in part from contributions from the Province of Manitoba's Manitoba Scholarship and Bursary Initiative and from funds established at The Winnipeg Foundation.

description.text: A great event hosted by Microsoft that RRC have had the fun and privilege to assist with for several years.

Cognitive Thinking: Assist students through a series on non-technical activities to illustrate how they use critical and creative thinking.
